title: Track Your Sleep to Optimize Your Life | Harpreet Rai on Health Theory
description: This weeks guest on Health Theory is Harpreet Rai.  Harpreet is an entrepreneur and the CEO of Oura Ring.  In this episode he talks about how to improve your sleep through tracking, how sleep improves your focus and his tips for losing weight.   Check out our amazing sponsors!
